The gameplay is amazing and ahead of its time when it was first released; however, toxic players plague the game and if one is sensitive this game is not recommended for its online matchmaking. Even casual is full of insults and hatred against one another. Besides the online matchmaking and its incompatibilities such as lack of being able to efficiently and quickly ban cheaters and the toxicity of the game, this is an enjoyable and skillful game to play. Workshop maps are also usually enjoyable, whether you want to train, experience community-made maps, or just play some fun maps with your friends. 

In as few words as possible, I can say the game's online feature is terrible due to other players but the workshop and offline gameplay are incredible.
Its is a good game, csgo has a steep as hell learning curve but once you get a hang of it the game truely is fun.
i hate this game so much it angers my insides to the fullest and makes me want to rip someones head off and shit down their throat. Fun game :)

This game is full of cheaters and toxic people.  Valve will not correct the cheating problems and only punish good players with their "trust factor" bull crap.  So, good players can get reported and then have low trust factor so they only play with blatant cheaters.  F this F-ing game, and F**k Valve.
